#summary How to use FaZend in your Zend projects

= Key steps =

1. To the directory structure recommended by Zend you will have to add /library/FaZend
2. Checkout latest version of FaZend from Google Code to some temp dir
3. Rsync files
4. Commit changes to your project SVN

= Details =

rsync for [http://www.rsync.net/resources/howto/windows_rsync.html windows]
